name: Phoenix spirit: Wisdom
desc: The power of the eternal phoenix fills you with wisdom. You feel the knowledge of a millennium.
apply_message: The power of the eternal phoenix fills you with wisdom. You feel the knowledge of a millennium.
remove_message: You feel the phoenix spirit's loaned power leaving your body.
